T

Tile - Class in net.nologin.meep.tbv
The surface of a TiledBitmapView is rendered using a collection of these Tile objects, each holding a bitmap suitable for rendering a square area of the surface.
Tile(int, int) - Constructor for class net.nologin.meep.tbv.Tile
Create a tile with side length Tile.DEFAULT_TILE_SIZE, IDed by the x and y coordinates of that tile in the grid.
Tile(int, int, int) - Constructor for class net.nologin.meep.tbv.Tile
Create a tile of the specified size length, IDed by the x and y coordinates of that tile in the grid.
TiledBitmapView - Class in net.nologin.meep.tbv
The TileBitmapView is an attempt to offer a relatively simple SurfaceView whose bitmap contents come tilewise from a provider (similar to many mapping libraries, but this has nothing to do with mapping).
TiledBitmapView(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class net.nologin.meep.tbv.TiledBitmapView
 
TileProvider - Interface in net.nologin.meep.tbv
Provider of Tile data for the TiledBitmapView (TBV from here on).
TileRange - Class in net.nologin.meep.tbv
Represents the range of tile IDs that make up the tile grid.
TileRange(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileRange
Create a Tile range by specifying the boundary IDs
tilesHoriz - Variable in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.ViewState
 
tilesVert - Variable in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.ViewState
 
tileWidth - Variable in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.ViewState
 
toggleDebugEnabled() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.TiledBitmapView
Toggle whether this view should render debug information
top - Variable in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileRange
 
toStr - Variable in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileRange
 
toString() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.Tile
 
toString() - Method in class net.nologin.meep.tbv.TileRange
